SQL.statement: CREATE REGULAR TABLESPACE Lime MANAGED BY DATABASE USING (FILE 'Lime.dms' 5120)
create table bozo6 (a char(3) not null, b char(3) not null, i int not null, j int, c char(25), v varchar(50)) in lime
create unique index ind6 on bozo6 (a,b asc)
update bozo6 set j=45 where i=4
create database partition group PG101 on all dbpartitionnums
create bufferpool BP1 database partition group PG101
alter module MOD1 publish distinct type TYPE1 as INTEGER with comparisons
create distinct type TYPE2 as INTEGER with comparisons
alter module MOD1 publish variable VAR1 MOD1.TYPE1 default 0
create tablespace TBS1 in database partition group PG101 bufferpool BP1 using stogroup SG1
create tablespace TBS2 in database partition group PG101 managed by database using (file 'TBS2_CONT' 8192) bufferpool BP1
create table T1(id int not null primary key, no int not null, name varchar(20)) in TBS1 index in TBS2
create index T1_INX on T1 (no ASC)
create table T2(id int not null primary key generated by default as identity(start with -20, increment by 5.0, CACHE 20), fk int not null, name varchar(20)) in TBS2 long in TBS1
create index T2_INX ON T2 (fk ASC)
create view T1_T2_VIEW as select no, fk from T1_ALIAS, T2
create view T1_T2_VIEW2 as select * from T1_T2_VIEW
alter table T2 add foreign key(fk) references T1(id)
create table T3(id int generated by default as identity(start with -20, increment by 5.0, CACHE 20), name varchar(20), fk int not null) in TBS1
create view T3_VIEW as select * from T3
alter table T3 add foreign key(fk) references T2(id)
create table T4(id int, name varchar(20)) in TBS1
alter module MOD1 publish procedure T1_PROC () specific T1_PROC_SPEC language sql begin insert into T1_ALIAS2 values(nextval for SEQ2, VAR2, '000'); end
alter module MOD1 publish procedure T1_PROC2 () specific T1_PROC2_SPEC language sql begin call T1_PROC(); end
alter table T4_R2 rename column name to name2
ALTER TABLE BOZO6 RENAME COLUMN i TO i1
ALTER TABLE BOZO6 RENAME COLUMN j TO j1
ALTER TABLE BOZO6 RENAME COLUMN c TO c1
ALTER TABLE BOZO6 RENAME COLUMN v TO v1
